RelatedSentence: The West Bengal government on Monday reinstated its seven senior officials who were removed from their posts early last month on the directive of Election Commission , to their previous postings .
The decision was taken after a high - level meeting at the state secretariat Nabanna on Monday , sources said .
The Election Commission on Monday withdrew the Model Code of Conduct allowing the state government to go ahead with development works or issuing any notification in this regard .

RelatedSentence: The state government , however , categorically said in the transfer order that all these officers would be brought back to their previous posts after the election process was over .
